scenario_text.value:
Wait, Agumon, you can understand what Kunemon
says, right?

That means something like, “Ryo’s not doing
so well and I’m worried about him.”

Right, okay. I kind of got that impression
myself.

Still, even if I can’t tell what Kunemon is
saying, you guys get it, right?

I don’t know... Probably some of us do, but
others don’t.

Huh... It must be tough not being able to
communicate.

Hm? I think...he’s saying thank you?
But I don’t get why.

What’s wrong, Takuma? Aren’t you going to
talk with Ryo?
